Name: S3SentinelConnector
DisplayName: AWS S3 to Sentinel Data Connector
Description: This solution deploys a high-performance data connector that ingests logs from AWS S3 buckets into Microsoft Sentinel. Features include multi-format log parsing (firewall, VPN, custom), automatic schema transformation, secure credential management via Azure Key Vault, ML-powered anomaly detection, and comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus metrics.

releaseNotes.title: Initial Release
releaseNotes.notes: Initial release of the S3 to Sentinel Data Connector with support for firewall and VPN log formats, Key Vault integration, DCR-based ingestion, and comprehensive monitoring.

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Log Analytics Workspace read/write access required to create custom log tables
Key Vault contributor access required to store AWS credentials

customs.name: AWS S3 Permissions
customs.description: AWS IAM user with s3:GetObject and s3:ListBucket permissions on the target S3 bucket
